医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
精神卫生保健的远程医疗可用性因地理位置而异兰德公司的一项新研究显示，各州心理健康保健远程医疗的可用性差异很大，从密西西比州和南卡罗来纳州等州只有不到一半的治疗机构可以联系到，而缅因州和俄勒冈州等州则可以联系到所有治疗机构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Telehealth-availability-for-mental-health-care-varies-significantly-based-on-geography.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Telehealth-availability-for-mental-health-care-varies-significantly-based-on-geography.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfda42bc-ec84-4d29-a280-92da68a23878 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 07:23:38 -0500 Telehealth availability for mental health care varies significantly based on geography
研究揭示肿瘤中自然杀伤细胞的“休眠”最新研究表明，我们体内的一些免疫细胞在进入实体瘤后，其“杀手本能”受到限制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Study-reveals-dormancy-of-natural-killer-cells-in-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Study-reveals-dormancy-of-natural-killer-cells-in-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d5cddad-e28e-4402-899f-675ac8583d30 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 07:09:44 -0500 Study reveals "dormancy" of natural killer cells in tumors
倩碧与西奈山合作建立西奈山-倩碧健康皮肤皮肤科中心倩碧和西奈山伊坎医学院今天宣布建立慈善合作伙伴关系，建立西奈山倩碧健康皮肤皮肤病中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Clinique-and-Mount-Sinai-partner-to-built-the-Mount-Sinai-Clinique-Healthy-Skin-Dermatology-Center.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Clinique-and-Mount-Sinai-partner-to-built-the-Mount-Sinai-Clinique-Healthy-Skin-Dermatology-Center.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=699d8029-6be7-48b7-914d-e30d0984693f Mon, 05 Feb 2024 06:55:21 -0500 Clinique and Mount Sinai partner to establish the Mount Sinai-Clinique Healthy Skin Dermatology Center
新数据显示，临床试验在种族和民族方面变得更具包容性历史上，所有群体的临床试验和医学研究一直缺乏多样性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Clinical-trials-becoming-more-inclusive-across-race-and-ethnicity-new-data-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Clinical-trials-becoming-more-inclusive-across-race-and-ethnicity-new-data-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc761054-1dca-4648-bc6b-e9bb13399064 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 06:46:44 -0500
苏达山克里亚瑜伽 (SKY) 练习是否可以减轻执业医生的压力并增加幸福感？ SKY 在减少有倦怠风险的医生的心理困扰和增强健康方面的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Does-Sudarshan-Kriya-Yoga-(SKY)-practice-reduce-stress-and-increase-well-being-in-practicing-physicians.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Does-Sudarshan-Kriya-Yoga-(SKY)-practice-reduce-stress-and-increase-well-being-in-practicing-physicians.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0399db32-782a-4cdf-b8fb-4c025192a2eb Mon, 05 Feb 2024 06:43:00 -0500 Does Sudarshan Kriya Yoga (SKY) practice reduce stress and increase well-being in practicing physicians?
“清洁细胞”功能障碍解释了肥胖者患糖尿病风险不平等的原因体内“清洁细胞”功能受损可能有助于解释为什么有些肥胖者会患上 2 型糖尿病，而另一些人则不会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Cleaning-cell-dysfunction-explains-unequal-diabetes-risk-in-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Cleaning-cell-dysfunction-explains-unequal-diabetes-risk-in-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e1ca3cc-110d-4d7f-bf57-1006081f0f19 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 06:36:59 -0500 "Cleaning cell" dysfunction explains unequal diabetes risk in obesity
探索富含饱和脂肪和胆固醇的饮食如何影响牙周病在格拉纳达大学领导的一项研究中，来自大西洋欧洲大学（UNEATLANTICO）的研究人员（例如 Mario Cordero 和 Maurizio Battino）研究了富含饱和脂肪和胆固醇的饮食如何影响影响牙周病的某些方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Exploring-how-diets-rich-in-saturated-fats-and-cholesterol-influence-periodontal-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Exploring-how-diets-rich-in-saturated-fats-and-cholesterol-influence-periodontal-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d9d9bec-8185-4a58-9170-7f8d9f81ac42 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 06:19:10 -0500 Exploring how diets rich in saturated fats and cholesterol influence periodontal diseases
全身性高炎症综合征诊断和治疗的新考虑点噬血细胞性淋巴组织细胞增多症（HLH）和巨噬细胞活化综合征（MAS）是危及生命的全身性高炎症综合征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/New-points-to-consider-in-the-diagnosis-treatment-of-systemic-hyperlingual-syndromes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/New-points-to-consider-in-the-diagnosis-treatment-of-systemic-hyperlingual-syndromes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=baaa3252-8de8-48e8-9fa8-175be8c769b6 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 06:11:01 -0500 New points-to-consider in the diagnosis, treatment of systemic hyperinflammatory syndromes
新方法有助于可靠地区分手术网片和正常身体组织伦敦大学学院的研究人员首次开发出了可以在 CT 扫描中清晰看到的手术网片原型，有望提高诊断和解决问题的速度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/New-method-helps-to-reliously-distinguish-surgical-meshes-from-normal-bodily-tissue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/New-method-helps-to-reliously-distinguish-surgical-meshes-from-normal-bodily-tissue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbe31a4d-7220-48c8-b493-5004eac749ec Mon, 05 Feb 2024 05:57:25 -0500 New method helps to reliably distinguish surgical meshes from normal bodily tissue
